data.title: Listings · LATOKEN
data.content: Skip to content Gallery LATOKEN Why to join LATOKEN? Culture Jobs Listings Copy doc Listings The LATOKEN growth machine scales your token by engaging 4M+ users acquired through 2,500+ airdrops and sector-focused launchpads. ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ ⁠Full presentation ⁠ Verify a Manager ⁠ | Contact ⁠ Success Casess at Launchpads ⁠Meme ⁠ AI ⁠ L1 ⁠ L2 ⁠ DeFi ⁠ Games ⁠ RWA ⁠ NFT ⁠ Social ⁠ Ecommerce ⁠ Investment ⁠ Interoperability ⁠ IoT ⁠ DePin ⁠ Metaverse ⁠ DAO ⁠ and more... ⁠ ⁠ Steps to get listed Select Package (via general link ⁠ or ask your manager for the link) Fill in Get Listed Form ⁠ ⁠ Pay (include signing of listing order-form/contract) Preparation Reserve Listing Date Set up Co-marketing Activities Set a Market Maker Stand by 1 hour before listing ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Listing Event Direct Pushes by LATOKEN: 1M+ mobile devices, 900K TG users. Email blast (announcement in the weekly newsletter). Banners at LATOKEN landing web/mobile 8M+ monthly visitors for each activity. SMM/Co-announcements across TG, X, FB, IG: Announcement of each activity (Listing, Airdrops, Trading Competitions) - crossposting Client Pin to TG group “Trade at LATOKEN from [date] [link] Put banner “Trade [token] on LATOKEN” to project landing page Activities (Recurrent monthly subscription recommended) Airdrop (tokens for marketing tasks with $3 traders acquisition costs, no bot farms) Trading Competition (tokens for trading) Staking (yeild in tokens for hodl - staking) Liquidity Zero Fee account or standard fees ⁠ (>$20M per month Maker 0, Taker 0.04%). Note: KYC for a non-restricted country. Capital minimum $5,000 in tokens and USDT (50/50) Referral bonus Introduce projects, track their applications in your referral cabinet, and get an automatic bonus on the listing payment date. Get Referral link> ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ 29 Share More Gallery Privacy Preference Center When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Cookie Notice Allow All Manage Consent Preferences Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. Analytics and Customization Cookies Analytics and Customization Cookies Allow cookies on the Coda website that help us analyze traffic and improve your experience. Advertising (Targeting) Cookies Advertising (Targeting) Cookies Allow the collection of data and use of cookies on the Coda website to personalize ads on partner websites. Third-party Publisher Analytics Cookies Third-party Publisher Analytics Cookies Allow third-party publisher cookies on their published docs used to track publisher document activity.
